Method Detail

replaceNear

public static void replaceNear(org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
Replace all the blocks of the explosions that happened near a player. Near is defined in the config by the parameter "advanced.distance-near".

Parameters:
target - The player around whom the explosions are replaced.

forceReplace

public static void forceReplace(WorldConfig world)
Force the replacement of all explosions in the specified world.

Parameters:
world - The world in which the explosions happened.

processExplosion

public static void processExplosion(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event,
                                    WorldConfig world)
Record all the blocks destroyed by an explosion.

Parameters:
event - The explosion.
world - The config for the explosion's world.

processExplosion

public static void processExplosion(java.util.List<org.bukkit.block.Block> list,
                                    org.bukkit.Location location)
Record all the blocks in the list, with the location as the source of the explosion.

Parameters:
list - The list of destroyed blocks.
location - The location of the explosion.

checkReplace

public static void checkReplace()
Check to see if any block has to be replaced in the explosions.

isNextToExplosion

public static boolean isNextToExplosion(org.bukkit.Location location)
Get whether the location is in the radius of an explosion. Do not use when in light weight mode.

Parameters:
location - The location to check.
Returns:
Whether the location is in the radius of an explosion.

isExplosionListEmpty

public static boolean isExplosionListEmpty()
Get whether there are no more explosions to replace.

Returns:
Whether there are no more explosions to replace.
